sourcesContent:
import React, { useState,useEffect } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const HooksApiView=(props)=> { //State management const [users,setUsers]=useState({ id:'', name:'', email:'', location:'', course:'', phone:'' }); //RESTAPI_CALLS useEffect(async ()=>{ await axios .get(`http://localhost:3001/react173/${props.match.params.idname}`) .then( (apiresult)=> setUsers(apiresult.data) ) },[]) return (<>
ID {id}
NAME {name}
EMAIL {email}
LOCATION {location}
COURSE {course}
PHONE {phone}
GOTO BACK
) } export default HooksApiView
